message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us at $1000000, but considering its importance to you, I believe we can bridge the gap with a mutually beneficial arrangement. I propose to offer you this remarkable product at a price of $950000. This represents a significant saving for you while ensuring a fair return for us. I look forward to discussing this further and hope we can reach an agreement that meets both our expectations.
